pkgmetadata.longdescription: Strategy Estimation // Implements variants of the strategy frequency estimation method by Dal Bo Frechette (2011) doi:10.1257/aer.101.1.411, including its adaptation to behavioral memory-one Markov strategies by Breitmoser (2015) doi:10.1257/aer.20130675, and the extension in the spirit of latent-class regression by Dvorak Fehrler (2018) doi:10.2139/ssrn.2986445.
